name: Anatomy Academy
description:
Anatomy Academy is a 2D, drag-and-drop, educational, kid-friendly game that aims to teach children about some of the important body parts that make up a human being. The game features 3 levels and can be finished in 5~10 minutes.

Players are tasked with completing the composition of body parts after briefly studying an image, completing each level will unlock encyclopedia entries explaining the various body parts in detail.

It was developed for a by a small team of college students for a short-term assignment over the course of 2 weeks, featuring custom-made graphics, original soundtracks as well as the usage of free game assets found online.

We hope you enjoy.
